description:
The Florida Parental Information and Resource Center at the University of South Florida (Florida PIRC at USF) is a federally funded project of the US Department of Education. The Florida PIRC at USF provides training and technical assistance to schools and districts on ways to effectively involve parents in their childrenGu00c7u00d6s education in order for all students to achieve at the highest academic level.

###MON###
###COL###
name: FLORIDA PARENTAL INFORMATION AND RESOURCE CENTER
